name: EnergiaDots
description:
EnergiaDots is a game that will make you realize that connecting dots is much more difficult than is sounds.
Try to connect the power sources without crossing the beams. Obstacles are there to make your day difficult but no worries because help is on the way. You can choose among three different kinds of help where available.

Try to solve 45 available levels with varying difficulties for the whole family. But don’t keep your hopes up because EnergiaDots can be a real brain teaser.

FEATURES

-45 levels in three categories
-Beautiful space related animated scenery
-Distance and time counter for serious competitions
